Name: Emailrep.io
Description: A service that provides reputation and risk analysis of email addresses using data points like breaches, social profiles, and activity patterns.
HTU: Use Emailrep.io to check the reputation of an email address. Simply enter the email to get information about its validity and associated risks.

Name: Haveibeenpwned
Description: A website that allows users to check if their email addresses or phone numbers have been compromised in data breaches.
HTU: Visit HaveibeenPwned.com and enter an email address to see if it has been compromised in any data breaches. Get details on specific breaches affecting the entered email.

Name: Dehashed
Description: A comprehensive database search engine for hacked data, enabling users to search for their information in leaked datasets.
HTU: Use Dehashed.com to search for compromised data across multiple data breaches by entering an email, username, IP address, or phone number. It provides detailed breach information and source links.

Name: Mx Email Lookup
Description: A tool to verify email addresses and gather information about the mail server (MX records) associated with them.
HTU: Perform an MX (Mail Exchange) lookup to find the mail servers associated with a domain. This can help verify if an email address is valid and locate its mail server details.

Name: Spycloud
Description: A cybersecurity service that helps organizations prevent account takeover by detecting and remediating stolen credentials.
HTU: Access SpyCloud to check if your personal or corporate data has been exposed in breaches. Enter email addresses or domains to get breach information and preventive measures.

Name: Ding
Description: A service for mobile top-ups that allows users to send prepaid mobile credit to phones worldwide.
HTU: Ding.com allows you to send mobile top-ups to prepaid phones worldwide. Select the recipient's country and enter their phone number to send a top-up.

Name: Twilio
Description: A cloud communications platform that enables developers to build, scale, and operate real-time communications applications via APIs.
HTU: Use Twilio's API to send SMS, make voice calls, and integrate various communication services into your applications. Sign up and follow the API documentation for implementation.

Name: NameCheckup
Description: A tool that checks the availability of a username across multiple social media platforms and domain names.
HTU: Visit Namecheckup.com to check the availability of a username across various social media platforms and domain names. Enter your desired username to see where it's available.

Name: APNIC
Description: The Asia Pacific Network Information Centre, which manages IP address allocation and internet resource management in the Asia-Pacific region.
HTU: Use APNIC's Whois search to query the APNIC database for information about IP addresses, AS numbers, and related network information. Enter an IP address or AS number to get details.

Name: Whois
Description: A query and response protocol used for querying databases to obtain information about the registration of a domain name or IP address.
HTU: Perform a WHOIS lookup to find registration details of a domain name or IP address. Use command-line tools or online services to get ownership and contact information.

Name: Viewdns
Description: A suite of free online tools that provide various DNS and IP-related information for websites, including DNS records, reverse IP lookup, and more.
HTU: Use Viewdns.info to access a suite of DNS and domain tools including reverse DNS lookup, traceroute, and DNS propagation checks. Enter a domain to get detailed DNS information.

Name: UrlScan
Description: A service that scans and analyzes websites for security issues, providing detailed information about the site's resources and behavior.
HTU: Visit urlscan.io to analyze the behavior of a URL. Submit a URL to get a detailed report on its content, requests, and potential security issues.

Name: The WayBack Machine
Description: A digital archive of the internet, allowing users to see archived versions of web pages across different points in time.
HTU: Use the Wayback Machine on archive.org to view archived versions of websites. Enter a URL to see its history and snapshots over time.

Name: Grabify
Description: A tool for creating trackable URLs, which can reveal the IP address and other information about the person clicking on the link.
HTU: Create a trackable link with Grabify to gather information about the IP addresses of those who click on it. Use the link to monitor click activity and location data.

Name: Verexif
Description: A tool that extracts and displays EXIF metadata from images, providing information about the camera settings and conditions when the photo was taken.
HTU: Visit Verexif.com to view and remove EXIF metadata from images. Upload an image to see details like camera model, geolocation, and date taken.

Name: Instaloader
Description: A command-line tool for downloading Instagram photos, videos, and metadata from public and private profiles.
HTU: Download Instagram photos, videos, and metadata with Instaloader. Use command-line instructions to specify what content to download from a public Instagram profile.

Name: TWINT
Description: An advanced Twitter scraping tool written in Python that allows for the collection of tweets and user data without API limitations.
HTU: Use TWINT to scrape Twitter data without API limitations. Run TWINT commands in Python to gather tweets, followers, and other information from Twitter profiles.

Name: IMEI Number Lookup
Description: A tool for checking the IMEI number of a mobile device to obtain information about its make, model, and status (e.g., if it is reported stolen).
HTU: Check the IMEI number of a mobile device to get information about its make, model, and carrier. Use online IMEI lookup tools to enter the number and retrieve details.
